titleStmt.title: Answers for the Earl of Lauderdale, to a printed paper, (entituled, The case of John Swinton, in relation to his fathers forefaulture) and to the pretended reasons of reduction of the said forfaulture, alledged to be now depending before the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Lauderdale, Charles Maitland, Earl of, d. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
